article_ref: Art. 48 Abs. 1 SSV und Art. 79 Abs. 6 SSV
law_text: during more than 2, but not more than 4 hours
notes: Extension of fine 254.b for parking a vehicle in a parking area indicated by signs or where parking is reserved for a certain vehicle category, exceeding the allowed time.

article_ref: Art. 48 Abs. 1 SSV und Art. 79 Abs. 6 SSV
law_text: during more than 4, but not more than 10 hours
notes: Extension of fine 254.c for parking a vehicle in a parking area indicated by signs or where parking is reserved for a certain vehicle category, exceeding the allowed time.

law_text: Parking on a no-parking line\na. up to 2 hours
notes: Parking on a no-parking line (usually yellow) for up to 2 hours.

law_text: during more than 2, but not more than 4 hours
notes: Extension of fine 255.b for parking on a no-parking line.

law_text: during more than 4, but not more than 10 hours
notes: Extension of fine 255.c for parking on a no-parking line.

law_text: Parking on a no-parking zone\na. up to 2 hours
notes: Parking in a no-parking area (usually marked with a yellow crosshatch or similar) for up to 2 hours.

law_text: during more than 2, but not more than 4 hours
notes: Extension of fine 256.b for parking in a no-parking area.

law_text: during more than 4, but not more than 10 hours
notes: Extension of fine 256.c for parking in a no-parking area.

law_text: Obstructive parking on a cycle path with a vehicle not permitted there (2.60; Art. 37 para. 2 and 43 para. 2 SVG) up to 60 minutes
notes: Obstructive parking on a cycle path with a vehicle not permitted there, for up to 60 minutes.

law_text: Obstructive stopping on a cycle path with a vehicle not permitted there (2.60; Art. 37 para. 2 and 43 para. 2 SVG)
notes: Obstructive stopping on a cycle path with a vehicle not permitted there.

article_ref: Art. 37 Abs. 2 SVG, Art. 33 Abs. 2 SSV
law_text: Obstructive parking on a pedestrian path with a vehicle not permitted there (2.61; Art. 37 para. 2 SVG, Art. 33 para. 2 SSV) up to 60 minutes
notes: Obstructive parking on a pedestrian path with a vehicle not permitted there, for up to 60 minutes.

article_ref: Art. 37 Abs. 2 SVG, Art. 33 Abs. 2 SSV
law_text: Obstructive stopping on a pedestrian path with a vehicle not permitted there (2.61; Art. 37 para. 2 SVG, Art. 33 para. 2 SSV)
notes: Obstructive stopping on a pedestrian path with a vehicle not permitted there.

law_text: Parking in a pedestrian zone at unmarked spots\na. up to 2 hours
notes: Parking in a pedestrian zone in an unmarked spot for up to 2 hours.

law_text: during more than 2, but not more than 4 hours
notes: Extension of fine 259.b for parking in a pedestrian zone in an unmarked spot.

law_text: during more than 4, but not more than 10 hours
notes: Extension of fine 259.c for parking in a pedestrian zone in an unmarked spot.

article_ref: Art. 9 Abs. 1 und 30 Abs. 2 SVG, Art. 67 Abs. 1 und 3 VRV
law_text: Exceeding the permissible weight after deduction of the device and measurement uncertainty set by the Federal Roads Office (ASTRA)\na. by no more than 100 kg
notes: Exceeding the allowed weight limit for motor vehicles, after deduction for tolerance and measurement uncertainty, by up to 100 kg.
